ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Funny :)
ygData.msgSnippet: We decided to play train crasher on our way through Black Burrow this weekend also, what fun! My thurs group ( I am a cleric there) warrior and I (we re
ygData.messageBody:
We decided to play train crasher on our way through Black Burrow this
weekend also, what fun!

My thurs group ( I am a cleric there) warrior and I (we're roomates)
were waiting for Beyond the Mat to start so we logged on and decided to
try the Langseax quest once (5 normal langs so far, good money, but not
the prize we've been looking for).

On our way to Halas, I zone into BB and here the required "Train to
Zone!!!!" shout. I fire up Lullaby and see what happens... You're
right talk about mass carnage! There ended being about 3 seperate
groups of 4-6 killing all the sleeping gnolls (I din't see any sign of a
4 limit on Lullaby, seemed I had a LOT more than that sleeping). My
warrior friend just stood back and butchered the runners (since the
youngins would get the xp anyway). It took about 20 minutes for them to
get the zone clear, but no complaints (it was fun to feel powerful).

Then about 45 minutes later, Erollsi Mar smiled on me and Frostbite led
us not to a naked Barbarian, but an armored one! Wooohoo, 20 minutes
later, my roomate was auctioning off his Shiny Brass Halbred, and
challenging me to a duel to see his max damage on his new Langseax of
Wolves :)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
